title: EXCLUSIVE: West Virginiaâ€™s MASSIVE Blow to 5 ESG-Loving Financial Institutions | Guests: Ami Horowitz & Riley Moore | 7/28/22
description:
Glenn goes into the first part of his series debunking CNN's claim of an "impostor Christianity" and exposes the Left's intent to pervert the doctrine of the Bible and warp Thomas Jefferson's original intent for separation of church and state. Filmmaker Ami Horowitz joins to discuss his latest video, which investigates the alliance between leftists and Palestine and exposes the LGBTQ persecution in Palestinian territories. Glenn presents this week's Badge of Merit to a good man who's always there to help his disabled veteran neighbor. West Virginia Treasurer Riley Moore joins to give his first interview regarding his state's latest anti-ESG actions against five big financial companies.
